name: eva-css-example-monorepo
description: EVA CSS monorepo example - shared configuration across multiple apps

scripts.build: npm run build:landing && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:docs
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch apps --watch eva.config.cjs --ext scss,cjs --exec 'npm run build'
scripts.dev:landing: npm run build:landing && npx http-server apps/landing -p 8010 -o
scripts.dev:dashboard: npm run build:dashboard && npx http-server apps/dashboard -p 8020 -o
scripts.dev:docs: npm run build:docs && npx http-server apps/docs -p 8030 -o

author: EVA CSS
